thread.title: BRIEF-Jazz Pharma Submits Supplemental New Drug Application For Xyrem To Treat Cataplexy And Excessive Daytime Sleepiness In Pediatric Narcolepsy Patients

title: BRIEF-Jazz Pharma Submits Supplemental New Drug Application For Xyrem To Treat Cataplexy And Excessive Daytime Sleepiness In Pediatric Narcolepsy Patients
text:
Market News May 1, 2018 / 12:56 PM / Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-Jazz Pharma Submits Supplemental New Drug Application For Xyrem To Treat Cataplexy And Excessive Daytime Sleepiness In Pediatric Narcolepsy Patients Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 1 (Reuters) - Jazz Pharmaceuticals PLC:
* JAZZ PHARMACEUTICALS SUBMITS SUPPLEMENTAL NEW DRUG APPLICATION FOR XYREMÂ® (SODIUM OXYBATE) TO TREAT CATAPLEXY AND EXCESSIVE DAYTIME SLEEPINESS IN PEDIATRIC NARCOLEPSY PATIENTS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
